E_MAIL_RECIPIENTS.label: The e-mail recipients for DAB mail notifications, comma separated

SMTP_PORT.label: The SMTP port used by the DAB to send e-mail messages

SMTP_HOST.label: The SMTP host used by the DAB to send e-mail messages

SMTP_USER.label: The SMTP user used by the DAB to send e-mail messages

SMTP_PASSWORD.label: The SMTP password used by the DAB to send e-mail messages

GI_STATS_DB_NAME.label: Elasticsearch db name (prefix for GI-stats indexes)

GI_STATS_ENDPOINT.label: The Elasticsearch endpoint where the statistics are stored

GI_PROXY_ENDPOINT.label: The GI-proxy endpoint used by accessors and downloaders (e.g. to circumvent firewalls)

DINAGUA_USER_TOKEN.label: The token used by the DINAGUA connector and downloader

SENTINEL_USER.label: The username used by Sentinel connector and mapper

SENTINEL_DOWNLOADER_TOKEN.label: The token used by Sentinel downloader for generating previews

DINAGUA_USER.label: The username used by the DINAGUA connector and downloader

DINAGUA_PASSWORD.label: The password used by the DINAGUA connector and downloader

INUMET_PASSWORD.label: The password used by the INUMET connector and downloader

NVE_TOKEN.label: The token used by the Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorat connector and downloader

INUMET_USER.label: The username used by the INUMET connector and downloader

SENTINEL_PASSWORD.label: The password used by Sentinel connector and mapper

RESULT_STORAGE_URI.label: Where to store user job results
